body: me@ivycode.net is his email, and apparently the PM system is confirmed.
body_tagged: me@ivycode.net is his email, and apparently the PM system is confirmed.
title: PM System Planned, Suggestions wanted

replies.body: PM system? Like in-game?
replies.body_tagged: PM system? Like in-game?

replies.body: Website.
replies.body_tagged: Website.

replies.body: Hmm. Well there should be a section to chat. E.g One tab will say Avicus network then private 1 on 1 chats group private chats so and so.
replies.body_tagged: Hmm. Well there should be a section to chat. E.g One tab will say Avicus network then private 1 on 1 chats group private chats so and so.

replies.body: Can't wait for this! It will be very useful, since some people don't have Skype but are very active on the forums.
replies.body_tagged: Can't wait for this! It will be very useful, since some people don't have Skype but are very active on the forums.

replies.body: Pretty sure he has my list on the admin planning doc
replies.body_tagged: Pretty sure he has my list on the admin planning doc

replies.body: The PM System sounds good but why not actually have a place where it shows what staff is online? Like "Avicus.net/onlinestaff" instead of searching all day on the LeaderBoards or forums or the staff page to see who is on? I think this would be useful to players looking for mods to help them with reports.
replies.body_tagged: The PM System sounds good but why not actually have a place where it shows what staff is online? Like "Avicus.net/onlinestaff" instead of searching all day on the LeaderBoards or forums or the staff page to see who is on? I think this would be useful to players looking for mods to help them with reports.

replies.body: I totally agree with SethSkye. We need a section of the forums in which we can check if there are any staff members online. Also, the button where you can add people as a friend needs to be implemented.
replies.body_tagged: I totally agree with SethSkye. We need a section of the forums in which we can check if there are any staff members online. Also, the button where you can add people as a friend needs to be implemented.

replies.body:
Instead of emailing him, could we post our suggestions here, and you link it to ivy?
If so:
Implement the friend button, players can PM all their friends and staff. Staff can PM anyone. Sr.Mods+ can see all PMs. Also, it would be great if a forum chat was added, where you click "online users" and another window opens up where you can chat with everyone, mods+ having perms to kick or tempban people from the chat ^-^

replies.body: I wouldn't really want anyone to read my messages, what's the purpose of calling it (Private) Messages when it won't be private?

replies.body:
They wouldn't/shouldn't however it is important that they have control over that.. In every single forums, minecraft or not related, the terms and conditions you sign when you join the forums include that you give permission for admin to access all your messages and whatnot. 

It doesn't mean they would nor should they really but it is to cover themselves in case an instance of "he said she said" etc etc happens.

even facebook can look at all your messages if they so please. Naturally they do not though. It is just one of those things :P
replies.body_tagged:
They wouldn't/shouldn't however it is important that they have control over that.. In every single forums, minecraft or not related, the terms and conditions you sign when you join the forums include that you give permission for admin to access all your messages and whatnot. 

It doesn't mean they would nor should they really but it is to cover themselves in case an instance of "he said she said" etc etc happens.

even facebook can look at all your messages if they so please. Naturally they do not though. It is just one of those things :P

replies.body:
Here's my take:

I don't think any staff should be able to view the conversation unless it is reported with a report button, then Senior Staff+ get access to the convo.

And yes, friends will be implemented back again, it's been added to the beta website already.
replies.body_tagged:
Here's my take:

I don't think any staff should be able to view the conversation unless it is reported with a report button, then Senior Staff+ get access to the convo.

And yes, friends will be implemented back again, it's been added to the beta website already.

replies.body: Plz no image sending. Keep hosting off dis site plz. While this is a very, very far stretch, a slippery slope even, it might be possible that nudes are exchanged, and considering most these people here be underaged you dont want that liability know what i mean?
